item.title: Top 5 things I learned about academics
item.description: Being a physics and math major was tough not only in terms of workload but also in getting acclimated to its difficulties. Here’s a top 5 list of things I learned while at Columbia! 1. Physics is physical To me, understanding physics used to mean understanding equations and being able to solve complex problems. However, in doing my major, I discovered the importance of intuition in physics. Creating, leading and developing a practical picture of the world not only helps you approach and solve problems but also gain a deeper understanding of novel phenomena.
